thread.title: Sarah Henderson
thread.title_full: Independent Carpet One Westland reviewed by Sarah Henderson

author: Sarah Henderson
title: Sarah Henderson
text: As young newlyweds my husband and I knew carpet would not be cheap but after visiting 3 different stores were in sticker shock. We had no idea what it would cost to carpet our over 2,000 sq ft new home. This is our forever home and we are so glad we came to Independent Carpet! Janet D'Ascenzo could not have been more helpful and really did a great job to put us at ease with this large purchase. We felt like we gained so much knowledge about the carpet from her and feel like we made an amazing choice! Everyone thinks are carpet looks great and I always make sure to tell them to go see Janet!! Thank you so much! We will be back do to our kitchen floor for sure and the best part is I don't have to go to all the other stores because I know Cathy & Janet will take great care of us!
